name: Wiggle Waggle
description:
Wiggle Waggle is a 2-4 player game where you compete against your friends in a series of minigames using custom controllers built to register the game.

The art style is inspired from the Mario series and Animal Crossing, providing a colourful and cartoon style view to the game. With thanks to the animators; Sean O'Donnell, Jord Lee and Zack McNaughton.

Programming was done by Kellem Porteous.

The game is still being worked on and only has two controllers.
